title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any Ollama model in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as an LLM, chat and embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, multi-user, dark mode, mobile).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Kotlin extensions, Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion service for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, vision, RAG, fine-tuning and more.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Open-WebUI, GPU support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing Ollama binary, module and OCI image for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal RAG chatbot template using Ollama + Chroma + Streamlit; drop PDFs and chat.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings any Ollama model to your server with slash commands.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama as a tool for Claude Desktop and other MCP clients.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama and run model-based tests.
